pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Djackal, Django Rest Framework extension[![version badge](https://badge.fury.io/py/djackal.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/djackal)![djackal image](https://imgur.com/XnlU8T9.jpg)**Djackal** is extension of Django REST Framework(DRF)that help you easily implement the necessary features on your web backend server.## WarningThis repository is on developing. Some bugs may exist, possible to change suddenly. And no document yet.## Installation pip install djackal
